body_html:
second!
I'm trying to implement this model in tf, ( https://arxiv.org/abs/1606.01700 ) which receives the same word at the word and character level to a lookup table and bidirectional LSTM (respectively), the output of both is then concatenated using a "gate" function before sending the imbedding to another LSTM.
Their Theano source-code is here: https://github.com/ nyu-dl/gated_word_char_rlm.

Their Theano source-code is here: https://github.com/ nyu-dl/gated_word_char_rlm.
body:
second!
I'm trying to implement this model in tf, ( https://arxiv.org/abs/1606.01700 ) which receives the same word at the word and character level to a lookup table and bidirectional LSTM (respectively), the output of both is then concatenated using a "gate" function before sending the imbedding to another LSTM.
Their Theano source-code is here: https://github.com/ nyu-dl/gated_word_char_rlm.
